name: WENS LINK (A Socio Economic and Cultural and Educational Organisation)
briefDescription: To establish Computer Education Centers in Rural area with a view to accelerating computer education among the educated unemployed and poor people.To minimize the fee structure of Computer Education and spread the awareness through Computer Education throughout  the country.To establish Computer training center for students and will teach them how to develop software and all types of networks.

address: 02 Dewan Complex, 1st Floor, Near Vijaya Bank Zoo Road Tiniali, Guwahati-21
